texto:
http://www.palaciodabolsa.pt/en/palacio-da-bolsa 
The palace was built in the 19th century by the city's Commercial Association in Neoclassical style. The interior of the Palace, only finished in 1910, was magnificently decorated by several artists. 
The most emblematic room of the Palace, the Arabian room, is unique and exclusive because of its richness and undisputed symbolism. The visits cost 7 euros, with a duration of 45 min you can visit and discover all the 8 magnificent rooms”.
